name: StarFighters
description:
You are a mercenary pilot fighting to survive in hostile space!

You got stranded in a asteroid field, filled with dozens of rival mercenary ships who want to collect the prize on your head!

Fight your way out and survive for as long as you can!

Official Twitter:   https://twitter.com/SchieppenStudio

// Keep in mind, this game is in early development and there's a lot to be added //
